body:
<DataSplitTable
  rowsInView={${1:10}}
  groupBy="${2:info}"
  bordered
  striped
  keygen={v => `${v.skc}`}
  childKeygen="size"
  data={data.info.list}
  fixed="both"
  columns={columns}
  style={{ height: 500 }}
/>

<SearchArea
  onSearch={this.handleSearch}
  onChange={this.handleChange}
  onClear={this.handleClear}
  value={data}
  style={{ minWidth: '800px' }}
  appKey="${1:appkey}"
  pageName="SearchArea"
  uid="testuser"
  componentId="${2:测试用例9}"
  advancedSearch={['订单号', '订单id', '邮箱', '站点']}
  buttonPosition="top"
  autoCollapse
  collapseOnSearch={false}
>
</SearchArea>
Submit } >

<Upload
  action="${1://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts}"
  accept="image/*"
  value={this.state.value}
  name="file"
  onSuccess={(res, file) => file.name}
  onChange={v => {
    console.log(v)
    this.setState({ value: v })
  }}
  limit={3}
  style={{ width: 300 }}
>
  <Button>
    <FontAwesome name="upload" />
    Upload file
  </Button>
</Upload>

<DatePicker
  range
  onChange={d => console.log(d)}
  type="datetime"
  allowSingle
  style={{ marginTop: '12px' }}
/>
